pages.text: Al-Ladhina Yaj`aluna Ma`a Allahi 'Ilahaan 'Akhara Fasawfa Ya`lamuna
Wa Laqad Na`lamu 'Annaka Yaiqu Sadruka Bima Yaquluna
Fasabbih Bihamdi Rabbika Wa Kun Mina As-Sajidina
Wa A`bud Rabbaka Hatta Ya'tiyaka Al-Yaqinu
Ata 'Amru Allahi Fala Tasta`jiluhu Subhanahu Wa Ta`ala `Amma Yushrikuna
Yunazzilu Al-Mala'ikata Bir-Ruhi Min 'Amrihi `Ala Man Yasha'u Min `Ibadihi 'An 'Andhiru 'Annahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa 'Ana Fa Attaquni
Khalaqa As-Samawati Wa Al-'Ara Bil-Haqqi Ta`ala `Amma Yushrikuna
Khalaqa Al-'Insana Min Nutfatin Fa'idha Huwa Khasimun Mubinun
Wa Al-'An`ama Khalaqaha Lakum Fiha Dif'un Wa Manafi`u Wa Minha Ta'kuluna
Wa Lakum Fiha Jamalun Hina Turihuna Wa Hina Tasrahuna
